en_text: He was better than me and taught me to play.
jp_text: 彼はボクより上手かったので いろいろ教えてくれました
google_translated: He taught me a lot because he was better than me

en_text: But he moved away during my sixth  year, and we made a promise.
jp_text: ですが６年生のとき 彼は引っ越すことになり—
google_translated: But when he is sixth grader he will move-

en_text: We'd join our middle school basketball teams
jp_text: ２人とも中学では バスケ部に入って—

en_text: and play against each other.
jp_text: いつか試合で戦おう と
google_translated: Try to fight in the game someday

en_text: That happened, huh?
jp_text: へー そんなヤツがいたんだ
google_translated: There was such a guy

en_text: How'd it turn out? he still plays, right?
jp_text: で どーなったの？ 今もやってんだろ バスケ？
google_translated: What happened?I'm doing it now?

en_text: No, he quit because of me.
jp_text: いいえ やめました… ボクのせいで
google_translated: I stopped doing it ... because of me

en_text: Why? What happened?
jp_text: なんで？ 一体 何が…
google_translated: why?What on earth…

en_text: Well, let me start from the beginning.

google_translated: That's right ... After all let's talk in order from here

en_text: The April after we made our promise,
jp_text: 彼と約束し 年が明けた４月—
google_translated: Promised with him April-April-April-

jp_text: ボクは帝光中学校に入学しました

en_text: The sky was unbelievably clear
jp_text: 春とは思えないほど澄んだ 青い空の日でした

en_text: The clear blue sky.
jp_text: 青く澄みきった空

en_text: Hope and uneasiness for a new life.

jp_text: そしてボクは 彼らに出会った
